features.featureTitle: Update the rank progression thresholds in `frontend/src/utils/rankUtils.ts` to use the new level ranges: E Rank Hunter (Lvl 1–5), D Rank Hunter (Lvl 5–10), C Rank Hunter (Lvl 10–15), B Rank Hunter (Lvl 15–20), A Rank Hunter (Lvl 20–30), S Rank Hunter (Lvl 30–40), SS Rank Hunter (Lvl 40–50), SSS Rank Hunter (Lvl 50–60), Shadow Monarch (Lvl 60+).
